metadata.title: CVE-2015-7972 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - low
metadata.description:
The (1) libxl_set_memory_target function in tools/libxl/libxl.c and (2)libxl__build_post function in tools/libxl/libxl_dom.c in Xen 3.4.x through4.6.x do not properly calculate the balloon size when using thepopulate-on-demand (PoD) system, which allows local HVM guest users tocause a denial of service (guest crash) via unspecified vectors related to"heavy memory pressure."

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-7972` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libxen-4.4 - 4.4.2-0ubuntu0.14.04.3
libxen-ocaml - 4.4.2-0ubuntu0.14.04.3
libxenstore3.0 - 4.4.2-0ubuntu0.14.04.3
xen-hypervisor-4.1-amd64 - 4.4.2-0ubuntu0.14.04.3
xen-hypervisor-4.3-amd64 - 4.4.2-0ubuntu0.14.04.3
xen-hypervisor-4.3-armhf - 4.4.2-0ubuntu0.14.04.3
xen-hypervisor-4.4-amd64 - 4.4.2-0ubuntu0.14.04.3
xen-hypervisor-4.4-arm64 - 4.4.2-0ubuntu0.14.04.3
xen-hypervisor-4.4-armhf - 4.4.2-0ubuntu0.14.04.3
